page.title: 17CAN THE VILLAGE SHOP SURVIVE
page.content: There is a little Post Office at Hopgrove which also sells newspapers, food and stationery.In the past five years it has changed hands four times. There are only 56 houses there.The shop faces competition from a very big supermarket at Huntington only two miles away.It is doubtful if the Hop- grove shop can survive especially if you compare these 1985 prices.
